mapper.select: select count(*) from latraincourse where coursecode=#{coursecode} and coursetitle=#{coursetitle}
select from latraincourse where coursecode=#{coursecode} and coursetitle=#{coursetitle}
mapper.delete: delete from latraincourse where coursecode=#{coursecode} and coursetitle=#{coursetitle}
mapper.insert: insert into latraincourse (coursecode, coursetitle,flag, makedate, maketime,modifydate,modifytime) values (#{coursecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
